task.title: Installing Software on Computers
task.shortdesc: In the event that you need to install software to test how it works on a variety of different machines or you plan to teach a class explaining how to use the software you are installing this information is important for you. This explains how to install software on the computers found in Shanks Hall rooms 180 and 360.

taskbody.context: Below are the tasks for installing software on the computers.

step.cmd: Insert the media drive (USB drive or disc) that contains the data for the software.
A window will automatically pop up linked to the media drive that you inserted.
Open the program files located on the media drive.
Double click on the file with the extension ."exe".
The program will then start installing on the computer,
After it finishes installing repeat this step for each computer in the computer lab until all of the computers you plan to use have the software installed.
